Create a patient location for a multibed unit

1 On the Create/Edit menu, click Locations.

2 In Description, enter the name of the bed location, such as “PACU Bed 001.” Descriptions should not be repeated within a department.

Note that the description only serves to help database administrators and DB Editor users identify the location—it does not appear in the application.

3 In Initials, enter a short version of the bed name, such as “001.” The initials identify the bed in the Unit Census and the ADT window.

4 In Location Type, click Location for patient admission.

Note that this type of location does not have a computer name.

5 Click Next.

6 Select a department.

7 Click Next.

8 Confirm the information and click Finish.
